post.title: what happened wile i was gone
post.body: i just updated zeronet after a long time of not using it and a lot has changed since the last time i was on

post.title: as of now im no longer using bitmessage
post.body: zeromail just came out and like i said in my other blog i will stop using bitmessage when zeromail as soon as zeromail comes out there for my bitmessage address is no longer active

post.title: im going to be gone for a bit
post.body: this blog will be dead for a wile but don't worry i will come back to it say new years eve how ever i will be trying to fix a few things on my blog i just can seem to get the new like button to pop up

post.title: i updated my zeroblog its about time
post.body: every one now is able to like my posts now yay why cant any one like my older posts i must of derped up some where i copied the js and the css folder and the index.html file what did i miss ?

post.title: im now running zeronet and bitmessage on my pi
post.body: i dont feel like running zeronet off my desktop i mostly use for gaming since my old comaq deskpro that i installed freebsd on died on me the othere day i had to use what ever i could get my hands on lucky i had my old pi laying around i don't think its even a model 1 since i got it after a year it first came out but that arm possessor should have the power to do it on top of that i should update my index site since i don't use bitcoin any more and come to think of it i would not have to use bitmessage either since there coming out with zeromail

post.title: call of duty black ops 3 screen shot
im back sorry guys
post.body: i had crap ton of stuff i had to do i almost forgot that i even had a blog in the first place nah just joking i never forgot about this blog i just got call of duty black ops 3 im planing on uploading a few screen shots to my blog

post.title: Ive been feeling sick lately
post.body: sorry i was unable to update this blog for a wile im having a hard time at work and i have been feeling very weak and sleepy i may even have to go to the doctor i've been been feeling like this for a few months now and i get a feeling some things up :[

post.title: well this is odd
post.body: i was looking in my music folder when i came across a file that i dont remember putting there and it was called tower.ogg i opened it and it seemed to be some sort of 8bit mix tape with a Mario themed thumb nail is it possible that some one has remote access to my pc nah im sure that no one knows my ip address but how ever it is possible to find out my ip on zeronet i think im not sure

post.title: im giving up on tor and now im thinking about using i2p
post.body: tor just seems too slow and i cant trust it some people can even steal your password you used to login tor book but i think the same goes for i2p and i think you have to leave i2p running once you install it sort of like freenet but i'm not to sure on that one scratches head i think im getting a bad case of chicken brain

post.title: should i run zeronet as a daemon on my othere pc
post.body: now that i got my old compaq up and running some how i was thinking about uninstalling tor on it and just use it as a ZeroNet node but i don't think it has the power to do it meh it should be able to handle it

post.title: I think that a image board like 4chan would be a bad idea
post.body: yes a image board would be pretty cool to have but the fact that any one can upload there own image to said board makes it a bad idea not every one plays by the rules if you know what i mean but that's just my opinion not also that but that image would be stored on to your pc as soon as you visit the site so imagine all of the photos on 4chan now imagine all of those photos stored on your hard drive umm yeah bad idea

post.title: i just updated this blog
post.body: there was a update for the zero blog platform now i and you can see the latest comments i wonder what will they add in the next update maybe some more bug fixes or more content want to know how to update your blog too hear is the link to the official zero blog site click me

post.title: should i keep windows 10
post.body: i upgraded to windows 10 a wile ago but i'm thinking of going back to 8 nah windows 8 sucked i mean the whole setup of 8 would make sense if i was using a tablet but on a desktop its a pain in the neck

post.title: is there any thing you want me to add to my index
post.body: now that i have a new index site is there any thing you want me to add to it other then just more links maybe some more pics or a video or a hidden page etc im thinking about putting my contact info on one page instead of having it on my index

post.title: i'm thinking about getting into bitcoin again
post.body: I had a bitcoin wallet once but i stoped after like a year or so because i never made any bitcoins and all of the mining pools i tried just installed risk ware on to my pc most of the time they were just scams sadly how ever i could try darkcoin or dogecoin but im still debating wether i should start using things like bitcoin again but hear is my bitcoin address if you want to donate to me 1EWqnnGFhKYo6N12BbNzLbLj4FDfFuNmpW

post.title: will this blog be hear after i'm gone ?
post.body: i get a feeling it will most likey not but as long as some one is seeding it people will be able to visit this site i wonder if its possible for some one else to update this site using my private key but then again this is my blog and that would defeat the point of it but the truth be told no one lives forever well i guess i will blog wile i still can im not going to go any time soon and i'm not sick or anything but you never know

post.title: i made a new index site
post.body: its still in the works but if you want me to add your site to the list message me on tox with your sites title and address here is the link Lostfiles Index

post.title: some thing funky is going on with my forums
post.body: so i went to check on my forum and i notice that there was 2 people seeding it but when i tried to add a new topic it would not let me so some things up meh i never really cared about the forums i made it was sort of a see if i can do it sort of thing i'm even thinking about deleting it any ways but for now i will leave it up for shits and giggles

post.title: i was unable to index it on zero search but
post.body: i started to look for some other index sites and i added my site to the list but i'm unsure if any one can see it yet here is the link to the site its called i'm also planning on making my own index site to how ever i will only give a hand full of people my private key better yet i could use this site all i would have to do is make a HTML file and put it in the sites folder and put a link to it in my blog ZeroNet Share

post.title: Is it possible to hide files with in a site
post.body: i get i feeling it is possible i've notice what ever you put in the folder where the files to your site is it shares it i wonder if some one could hide pictures and even videos or even zip file but that being said it kinda scares me well i guess i will have to be more careful about what site i visit because some one could be possibly hiding some thing very nasty with in there zeronet site like a creepy spider hiding under your bed waiting for you to get up and step on the floor so it can jump up and bite you or latch on to your face

post.title: I got call of duty world at war on steam
post.body:
so i got the game reticently even though its old i was thinking it was a just another waste of my time and money at first but as soon as i started playing it i started to like it now i cant stop playing it i also like the fact that you can use mods and there are dedicated servers to also i don't have to put up with a bunch screaming 13 year olds man what happened to cod why is it so terrible now why did they have to add a bunch of silly dlc on top of that thats like putting a cherry on top of a pile of shit
this is a snapshot of the start menu of cod world at war yes my cod user name is the same as my zeronet user name you can add me as a friend if you want to :3

post.title: I tried to upload a video to my Blog but
post.body: i was having trouble seeding it after adding a video to my blog so i removed it due to the fact i was taking up to much memory so from now on im not going to add any videos to my blog sorry it just uses up to many resources well i could just try to use a smaller video

post.title: I have a new ZeroTalk site
post.body: i notice that the nuZeroTalk site was clone able so i tried it out for my self to see if it was legit and it was so now i have my own forums well kinda im still working on it i made 2 topics so far and im trying to teach myself how to make subtopics if you want to check it out hear is the link click me for a cookie (its not seeded by anyone yet)

post.title: i've been trying to index this site on ZeroSreach
post.body: i tried to add this site by copying and pasting the address in the submit box but it says that it was not currently working so i posted my site address and title to the zerotalk forum it told me to use but im still waiting for a response but then again i can find other ways of telling people about my site

post.title: Too much coffee
post.body: i have a bad habit of drinking way too much coffee i need to find some way to stop my self from doing so and only drink one cup of coffee a day instead of 2 or 3 or better yet  just stop drinking it and on top of that i would buy a red bull after i've had a cup of coffee at work i really need to stop its not good of my over all heath but despite my habits of over eating and drinking to much coffee im skinny as a stick

post.title: looks like bittorent came out with some thing like Zeronet
post.body: i saw some about project maelstorm on the Forums so i googled it and come to find out maelstorm was some what like zeronet how ever it was not legitimately p2p and it look like its still in its alpha stages and every site you visit is not seeded automatically but you can stream videos music etc but it just dose not have a very solid feel it seems to be lacking something

post.title: is there anything you want me to add
post.body: i cant belive i just started my blog and all ready im running out of ideas meh it will come to me in time maybe i should try to look at the news or something maybe then i can find more things to blog about and dont be afraid to comment i would love to hear what you have to say

post.title: Anyone still play quake 2?
post.body: im a big fan of any thing made by ID software and some of there quake games how ever some of them are unplayable due to there age and the fact there no longer being updated but thats why i use mods im using MKquake 2 and for quake 1 im using proquake im still looking for MKquake servers to play on im having a hard time doing so but i will find one some day if not i will find another quake 2 mod that has a server browser or better yet i will host my own :3

post.body: i wanted to start using bittorrent but latey ive heard that there starting to block copy righted links im no pirate but that can be a bit of a pain in the but depending on what you are doing i could just use emule but it is full of malware and fake servers now and theres not much support for it now
